text.p: Custom response and numerical response problems may also be written to provide randomization of problems. Randomization can be used to change the question asked, so that each student gets a different question. This helps discourage automated cheating, for example.

Note that how often a problem is re-randomized is determined by settings defined within course.xml. For example, problems can be re-randomized (ie the seed for the random number generator changed) every time the problem is viewed, or only once per student.
